Text: The Duchess of Padua is a play by Oscar Wilde.
Triplets:<The Duchess of Padua
2:
--------------------
Text: The Duchess of Padua:  It was written for the actress Mary Anderson in early 1883 while in Paris.
Triplets:<The Duchess of Padua
3:
--------------------
Text: The Duchess of Padua:  After she turned it down, it was abandoned until its first performance at the Broadway Theatre in New York City under the title "Guido Ferranti" on 26 January 1891, where it ran for three weeks.
Triplets:<The Duchess of Padua
4:
--------------------
Text: The Duchess of Padua:  It has been rarely revived or studied.
